@legend_kayad wrote:

this seriously works, my name is teddy i am a freak, dont blame me for the message below please

ok, tel her you’re going on holiday to her favourite place get her flowers and take her out for a meal, then, chop fof your finger, put it in a cup of dark red wine during the dinner, and then she will drink it, she will probably faint at the thaught, then, you kill every1 in the resteraunt, take her to a celler with white foam walls and straight jackets, tigh her up to a chair, so she cannot get out, yang her hair up so her skalp is half way off, tigh it to the back of the chair… tight, then put continues dripings of water on her head, stab her several times, make sure she stays alive, i meen just like take blood, and right on the floor: if you screem you are electricuted to death, if you try to move i will some to you and skin your below! then, keep her there, this is pure torture, turn on american un anser phoned adverts, 3 or 4 over and over again at the other side of the room, make sure you never realy kill her, she thinks that when she moves she will die, make it a very large shock, to faint her, but not to kill, aventualy, the driping on the head and the sound of music wil drive her crrraaaaaaaaazy, she will yank her head off and run towards the radio to turn it off, then, she faint from the shock, then you take her on holiday, because of the 5 years of no talking just pure torture, she will obey your every move and only talk hen you tell her to, you look her in the eye, make her come to a 5 star hotel with you, then, while you are there, explain to her what a fucking twat she has been to you, and tell her you love her, then, kill her, the next day, get a gun, put it to your mouth, and pull the trigar! trust me, it works.

item.title: What do you do when your girlfriend is
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]If you want my serious opinion talk to her and find out why shes ticked try to find some way to fix it? Flame me if you want =P.

Most of the time girls are pissed because guys are too clingy and “Helpful” anyway. Trying to “Fix” things rarely helps. Lift some wheights and fuck some other chicks to show her whose boss, that’s how a real man handles things.[/quote]

Also a great way to get STDS, and her to leave you if you actually do like her…remember i’m just giving my 2 cents. AFI, i’m just trying to help, I dont know her personally so I cant help you other than that.

Also its better then Gagging her (yes I know you were kidding).
